author: Special Correspondent
text:
Narasappa (35), a contract pourakarmika, sustained grievous injuries on Saturday when the garbage truck he was driving overturned and fell into a 25-ft pit while he was reversing the vehicle at an illegal dump yard in Peenya.

According to the Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike (BBMP) officials, the accident occurred around noon when Narasappa had gone to the quarry pit that had been converted into a dump yard in BHEL Colony, Mallasandra.

The incident came to light when locals heard his cries and rushed to help. He was first taken to a nearby private hospital and later to Victoria Hospital.

- Special Cotrrespondent
title: Man dies in accident after truck overturns
